content: this is a redesign of the original mini rings of change four years after the publishing of my very first pattern the pattern writing is greatly improved in this version and will be much easier to follow also changed in this version removed all extended crochet stitches removed picots removed crazy skipped stitches watch for the full size betterings of change pattern which is 110 rounds and 96 /244cm mini betterings of change can be continued into the big pattern from round 42 find me on facebook frank orandle 1 my facebook crochet group made of change cal 2 as always feel free to contact me if you have any questions i am always happy to help 1 https //www facebook com/frank orandle 2 https //www facebook com/groups/1624116321152445/
